gov.va.isaac.interfaces.gui.views

Interface TaskWithConceptViewI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IsaacViewI, ViewI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PopupTaskWithConceptViewI, WorkflowAdvancementViewI, WorkflowHistoryViewI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorkflowAdvancementView, WorkflowHistoryView

    @Contract
public interface TaskWithConceptViewI
extends ViewI
    TaskWithConceptViewI An interface that allows the creation of an TaskWithConceptViewI implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends/implements ViewI. This panel is intended to allow display and manipulation of a specified existing workflow task, which itself contains a displayable concept
    Author:
    Joel Kniaz
